post.title: Signal Safety Meetings
post.author: ssuslh1
post.content:
There’s an added bonus for your Insured being a SafeShore Covered Employer!  Employers have access to Signal’s safety and loss prevention services just like the Mutual Members.  Employers will have 24-hour access to the safety website, be eligible to attend local safety and training seminars, and will receive all the safety newsletters.

Helpful Links:

Safety Center https://www.signalmutual.com/safety-center/
Safety Calendar of Events https://www.signalmutual.com/safety-center/signal-safety-events/
OSHA Resources https://www.signalmutual.com/safety-center/osha-resources/
